ygData.subject: Re: Rune of Proximity
ygData.msgSnippet: I traded a rune of fulguration for a greater lightstone last night, but that was to a friend so I really trusted him on the price. 10pp sounds excessive, but
ygData.messageBody:
I traded a rune of fulguration for a greater lightstone last night, but that
was to a friend so I really trusted him on the price. 10pp sounds excessive,
but it all depends for what spell that rune is used. If it's a level 16
spell, I guess 5pp is a good price. If it's a level 49 spell, 20pp or more
is a good price. Later on, I'm going to buy all the research books even the
ones that are not to enchanters. Actually can we make other spells than
enchanters spells with research?
Skara

-----Original Message-----
From: Dalton Handy [mailto:dhandy@...]
Sent: Thursday, May 13, 1999 10:28 AM
To: eqenchanters@onelist.com
Subject: Re: [eqenchanters] Rune of Proximity


From: "Dalton Handy" <dhandy@...>

I have seen Wizards on Karana offer 10pp each for Runes..

Than you for your help
Eregil - Mith Marr
